titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Irish armie in Ulster sent to the Parlament in a letter from William Basill, Esquire, Atturney [sic] General of Ireland, which letter and declaration are ordered by the Parlament to bee [sic] printed, and were referred to the Council of State to see it don[e] accordingly : to which is added som[e] Remarques thereupon, by a private pen.
titleStmt.author: Basill, William.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Irish armie in Ulster sent to the Parlament in a letter from William Basill, Esquire, Atturney [sic] General of Ireland, which letter and declaration are ordered by the Parlament to bee [sic] printed, and were referred to the Council of State to see it don[e] accordingly : to which is added som[e] Remarques thereupon, by a private pen.
titleStmt.author: Basill, William.
Private pen.
Ireland. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Du-gard, by the appointment of the Council of State,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

person.persName: the appointment of the Council of State
